headline: The US-Venezuela Confrontation is a Lose-Lose for Energy Markets
summary: Venezuelan heavy oil provided 13% of Gulf Coast refinery imports in 2024, so any disruption risks higher U.S. fuel prices

headline: The ELC Awards $2 Million in Scholarships to More Than 100 Emerging Business Leaders in 2025 Cohort
summary: The Executive Leadership Council (ELC) proudly announces the recipients of its 2025 ELC Scholarships, awarding $2 million in academic support to 102 outstanding undergraduate and graduate students. This year marks the 30th anniversary of the ELC's flagship scholarship program, a transformative initiative that has supported over 1,100 students since its launch in 1995.

raw.headline: The ELC Awards $2 Million in Scholarships to More Than 100 Emerging Business Leaders in 2025 Cohort

headline: Chevron Targets 30,000 Bpd Output in Argentina's Vaca Muerta by 2025
summary: CVX plans to boost oil production in Argentina's Vaca Muerta shale to 30,000 bpd by end-2025, underscoring its commitment to shale expansion.
